Class UserManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • use_cases.UserManager

  • public class UserManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A use case class to interact with User objects

                       java.lang.String email,
                       java.lang.String password,
                       UserType type)
        Creates a user account and the minimal amount of information required is email, password and type
        Parameters:
        name - the full name of the user
        email - a valid email which will also serves as the username when logging in
        password - a combination of characters defined by user
        type - a code to differentiate user types.

        Parameters:
        selectUsers - A List of UUID objects where each UUID represents a user.
        Returns:
        a List of strings where each string is a string representation of a user.

      • isFavouriteSpeaker

        public boolean isFavouriteSpeaker(java.util.UUID vipId,
                                  java.util.UUID speakerId)
        Return true iff the speaker is one of the vip user's favourite speakers. This method checks before the program performs more complex tasks to prevent errors.
        Parameters:
        vipId - id of the vip who may have speaker with speakerId as their favourite
        speakerId - id of the speaker whom we want to check
        Returns:
        a boolean value as explained above
